definition: see 廢寢忘食|废寝忘食[fei4 qin3 wang4 shi2]
to abolish/to abandon/to abrogate/to discard/to depose/to oust/crippled/abandoned/waste
variant of 廢|废[fei4]/disabled
old variant of 寢|寝[qin3]
to lie down
to forget/to overlook/to neglect
meal/to eat/classifier for meals

sentences.english: The art of concentr can help you turned into a terrific trarticleer.
sentences.chinese: 废寝忘餐的艺术能够援助你成为一个杰出的营业者。

sentences.english: Absorbed in the work, he neglected food and sleep.
sentences.chinese: 他专心致志于这项工作，到了废寝忘餐的地步。

definition: to burn the midnight oil (idiom); to work continuously night and day
to stay up through the night (idiom)
overnight until daybreak (idiom); all night long/day and night
lit. always with a book in hand (idiom)/fig. (of a student or scholar) diligent and hardworking
to dress before light and not eat before dark (idiom)/diligently attending to official matters
diligently
to be unable to sleep at night
incessant/relentless
lit. to make night as day (idiom); fig. to burn the midnight oil/work especially hard
to exhaust one's thoughts and ingenuity (idiom); to think sth through thoroughly/to rack one's brains/to leave no stone unturned
deliberately/on purpose
lit. not even peek at the garden/fig. to be absorbed in one's studies (idiom)
assiduously
lit. to spit out one's heart and spill blood (idiom)/to work one's heart out/blood, sweat and tears
to rise early and sleep late (idiom); to work hard/to study diligently/to burn the candle at both ends
expert craft from hard practice (idiom); hard-won skill/A masterpiece demands suffering.
